Banner.Description: Hello my name is mohamad Hamsho
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: As a Software Engineer with a passion for purposeful projects, I thrive on creating impactful solutions that align with my values . My focus is on developing innovative technologies that not only solve problems but also contribute to the greater good. I am commited to building apps and systems that make a difference, with a particular interest in projects that blend technology with meaningful, real-world applications .
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack Developer
Description: Leader in technical decision making
Hiring technical talent for the company
Team leader of the technology department
Creation and maintenance of an internal process management platform for course sales
Programming custom functions and plugins for customizing a WordPress platform
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.
Planning and reporting meetings.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack Developer
Description: Creation and maintenance of a monitoring platform with charts in WordPress.
Functional programming in templates and plugins to add necessary monitoring features.
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.

Creation and maintenance of a second Monitoring Platform made with Angular, Angular Material, Laravel, MySQL, RxJS, Sass with configurable charts, alarm systems, and user management and general configuration settings.
Planning and reporting meetings.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Freelancer
Description: Continuous improvements implementation, working on frontend and backend.
Creation of platforms with Angular, Laravel, WordPress programmed with functional, reactive, and object-oriented programming paradigms.
Process automation with data structures.
Template designs with SASS, Bootstrap, Materialize, Bulma, etc.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack Developer
Description: Leading a team of 4 people in the development of a tourism data management platform made in Angular, Laravel, and MySQL.
Implementation of CI/CD in Azure. Refactoring and optimizing application load times.
Coding API requests with RxJS.
Creating modules with complex reactive forms.
Writing weekly reports about goals and plans.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend Developer
Description: Creating WordPress templates with ACF, functional programming in JavaScript/jQuery, styles in SASS.
Integrating design and load time improvements for templates.
Effective communication with the design team, working with Avocode/Figma.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Systems Analyst
Description: Programming new functionalities for an existing employee management platform made with Angular and ExpressJS.
Refactoring old code. Ensuring compatibility of each dependency with each update, including regular Angular updates.

Experience.Jobs.Title: English Teacher
Description: Teaching basic English to a student body of over 200 students.

FeatureProjects.Title: Experience
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Projects

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Quran Quest
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: As the Founder of Baraqah Bros , I created a mobile app company dedicated to gamifying education for Muslims , making learning engaging and accessible through innovative digital experiences.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: UMMA APP
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: At UMMA APP LLC, I work as a Software Engineer , where I design and develop innovative mobile solutions tailored to the needs of the Muslim community, focusing on creating seamless and impactful user experiences.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Proyexiot
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Data monitoring platform for water wells, tugboats, and various installations made from scratch with an auth module, configurable graphs, configurable alarms, user management, and geolocation with openlayers. It also has logic for reactive forms for parameter configuration.

OtherProjects.Title: More Projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Hands Game
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Extended rock-paper-scissors game. A personal project developed in Angular where you play randomly against the machine. It features the use of services, interfaces, and components.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Countries Viewer
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Interface that consumes a countries API where you can view a list of countries, see details of each country, filter by name and region. It also has a dark mode to switch between dark and light themes.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Four Card Feature Section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page with a minimalist design listing 4 features in 4 cards. Entry animations are used with Angular animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Social Proof Section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a page designed from a design made in Figma. Angular was used for development along with SASS and CSS GRID.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: FAQ Accordion Card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Frequently asked questions accordion with logic and animations made in Angular.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Profile Card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Simple design of a page featuring a profile card with basic information of a person.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
